articles.title: Best Foldable Phones in 2025: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold, Z Flip, Moto Razr, Pixel Fold
articles.author: Andrew Lanxon
articles.summary: Samsung, Motorola, Google and Oppo are key players in the foldable phone market. Recent or upcoming foldable models include the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5, Motorola Razr, Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold, and Oppo Find N5, with Samsung's new foldables typically launching in August, Razrs in June, and Google's in October or September.

articles.title: Samsung Canada Expands Retail Presence with Immersive New Store at Scarborough Town Centre
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada announced the grand opening of its new Samsung Experience Store at Scarborough Town Centre (STC) on February 21. The new store is designed to offer an enhanced experience for customers, featuring device comparisons, troubleshooting, Samsung UCDBF@jDs, and more.

articles.title: Saie's New SuperSuede Just Squashed My Beef With Powder Blush
articles.author: Daisy Maldonado
articles.summary: Saie introduced a new powder blush, which a beauty writer received and tested. The writer noted the pigment wasn't as strong as liquid or cream blushes, but the payoff was still impressive. On the skin, the blush provided a creamy and dewy finish with buildable coverage.

articles.title: Samsung Canada Expands Retail Presence with Immersive New Store at Scarborough Town Centre
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada opened a new Samsung Experience Store at Scarborough Town Centre on February 21. The store showcases new technology, including the Galaxy S25 series and innovations like Samsung Health, Now Brief, and Live Translate. These features are designed to enhance daily life for Canadians through connected devices.

articles.title: Samsung Canada Expands Retail Presence with Immersive New Store at Scarborough Town Centre
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Canada has opened a new Samsung Experience Store at Scarborough Town Centre. The store showcases new technology, including the new Galaxy S25 series, Samsung Health, Now Brief, and Live Translate, allowing customers to experience these innovations firsthand and receive expert support.

articles.title: I'm the cheapest person I know, but this $20 aluminum-free deodorant is worth every cent
articles.summary: Salt & Stone Deodorant, an aluminum-free stick, is Amazon's No. 1 bestselling deodorant and retails for $20. The deodorants are formulated without aluminum, parabens, sulfates, phthalates and alcohol, but do contain nourishing ingredients like hyaluronic acid to promote moisture retention and spirulina to help soothe irritated skin.

articles.title: Trying internet sensations: Cinnabon dusted grapes!
articles.author: Ashley Thompson
articles.summary: Cinnabon is offering Cinnabon flavored grapes, a new internet sensation.

articles.title: How to Use a Vibrator, According to a Sex-Toy Expert 2025
articles.summary: The article introduces several vibrators including the Magic Wand Rechargeable Extra Powerful Cordless Vibrator from Magic Wand Brand for stimulating the clitoris and vulva, the Lelo Sona Cruise from Lelo using pressurized air waves to mimic oral sex, the Dame Pom from Dame as a palm vibrator for diffused stimulation, the We-Vibe Sync 2 from We-Vibe, and the Lovehoney Jessica Rabbit 10 Function Silver Rabbit Vibrator from Lovehoney for simultaneous G-spot and clitoris stimulation.

articles.title: NComputing Advancing Endpoint Computing with Raspberry Pi CM5-Powered Thin Clients
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NComputing has launched the RX540 thin client, powered by the Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 platform. The device offers increased CPU performance, memory bandwidth, and local GPU performance and is optimized for Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) and Desktop-as-a-Service (DaaS) solutions.

articles.title: How to Use a Vibrator, According to a Sex-Toy Expert 2025
articles.author: Amanda Chatel
articles.summary: The article introduces several vibrators from different brands, including the Magic Wand Rechargeable Extra Powerful Cordless Vibrator, Lelo Sona Cruise, Dame Pom, We-Vibe Sync 2, and Lovehoney Jessica Rabbit. These products offer a range of features, targeting different user preferences for external and internal stimulation, and include options for solo and couples' use, with some models featuring app-controlled functionality.

articles.title: Lucid Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Financial Results
articles.author: Lucid Group
articles.summary: Lucid Group's forward-looking statements include plans and expectations related to commercial product launches, future programs including the Midsize program, vehicle production and delivery timing and volumes, expansion and construction of Lucid's AMP-1 and AMP-2 manufacturing facilities and capabilities, and future market launches and international expansion. The statements also address expectations regarding market opportunities and demand for Lucid's products.

articles.title: Paris Saint-Germain launches PSG Labs, a global innovation hub with first international expansion in Doha
articles.author: QNA
articles.summary: Paris Saint-Germain has launched PSG Labs, a global initiative to accelerate technology in sports, fan experience, and performance. The club is also expanding its global presence with the launch of its first international PSG Lab in Doha, acting as an innovation engine to identify and support startups, entrepreneurs, and tech partners.

articles.title: Microsoft floats the idea of a free Office tier, complete with ads
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Microsoft is considering a new free, ad-supported tier for its classic Office suite, potentially named Microsoft 365 Copilot.  This version would feature ads, limit file saving to OneDrive, and restrict advanced features, but Microsoft clarifies that there are currently no official plans to launch it.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Aldi as ‘really good' Olaplex dupe that helps hair growth gets even cheaper at just £1.99
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi launched a new haircare range called 'Lacura bonded haircare range' as a more affordable alternative to Olaplex. The Lacura range includes a pre-wash treatment, moisture mask, and oil, priced at £1.99, while Olaplex products are significantly more expensive. The company's products reportedly aim to help repair broken bonds in the hair by targeting five types of damage: chemical, heat, mechanical, environmental, and lifestyle changes.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Aldi as ‘really good' Olaplex dupe that helps hair growth gets even cheaper at just £1.99
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is selling Lacura haircare range as dupes for Olaplex products at a price of £1.99. Olaplex has gained a cult following thanks to claims to offer long-lasting effects, but their shampoo and conditioner bundle sell for £56 whereas Lacura offers pre-wash treatment, shampoo, and conditioner all priced at under £5 each.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Aldi as ‘really good' Olaplex dupe that helps hair growth gets even cheaper at just £1.99
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi introduced a more affordable alternative to Olaplex's haircare range with its Lacura line, priced at £1.99 per item. The Lacura range includes a pre-wash treatment, shampoo, and conditioner, offering a budget-friendly option to consumers.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Customs: DocUnlock's AI Platform Unlocks Supply Chain Efficiency
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: DocUnlock, an innovative AI platform, is launching to revolutionize customs processes. The platform aims to streamline and improve the efficiency of importing goods.

articles.title: Walmart is offering $160 off the LG 75-inch webOS Smart TV this week
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a flash deal on the 75-inch LG UHD webOS Smart TV, discounting it to $538 from its regular price of $700. The LG Smart TV features the webOS 22 platform, 4K UHD picture quality, and AI-powered picture and sound enhancement via the α5 Gen5 AI Processor. It also includes a Game Optimizer and Dashboard for gamers.

articles.title: A serious paper about a silly task, written accordingly
articles.summary: Weird AI Yankovic system uses a specialized sampling procedure and backward text generation with XLNet to produce parody lyrics that meet syllable and rhyme scheme constraints. The system embraces failure and constraint on the style and shape of the language to generate parodies.

articles.title: Amazon is testing a new program that pays media companies for sending it shoppers
articles.author: Lucia Moses
articles.summary: Amazon is testing a new program called NCA (Native Commerce Advertising), which pays publishers for driving traffic to Amazon through product recommendations, regardless of whether a purchase is made. CNN, Vox Media, and Future are participating in the NCA pilot. Amazon is pitching the NCA program to publishers as a way for them to make additional money on top of its Amazon Associates program.

articles.title: NSGP Is The Future Of Blockchain Gaming Unveiled
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The New Society Gaming Platform (NSGP) launched its blockchain gaming platform. The company aims to set a new benchmark for the gaming industry.

articles.title: Digital Economy: Yango Senegal Supports the Restaurant Industry
org: National Agency for Statistics and Demography
articles.summary: Yango Senegal, a subsidiary of Yango Group, has launched its food delivery service in Senegal, integrated within the Yango SuperApp. The service aims to support the local restaurant sector by providing a digital platform for restaurants to reach a wider customer base and increase order volume, with commission fees being waived to support local businesses. Several partner restaurants are already operational on the platform, and the service is available on Android and iOS.

articles.title: 9 Bras From Bare Necessities That Are About To Become The Ones You Always End Up Reaching For
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Bare Necessities is introducing new bra designs, including a plunge bra with U-back and reinforced side panels, a high-impact sports bra with adjustable straps, and a seamless lifting bra. They also offer a comfortable wire-free bralette and a strapless bra with hidden underwire and silicone grippers.

articles.title: United Brands Unveils Innovative Whip-It! Whipping Cream
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: United Brands has launched the Whip-It! Whipping Cream, designed for use with the Whip-It! Specialist Dispenser. The Whipping Cream offers a creamy texture and extended shelf life, while the dispenser is crafted from stainless steel and designed for precise portioning. Together, the products aim to boost kitchen efficiency by reducing waste and ensuring consistency.

articles.title: Google's new feature will allow advertisers generate, test AI-powered images in ads
articles.author: Technext
articles.summary: Google launched a suite of new creative updates and AI-powered creative tools. These tools are designed to enable advertisers in their creative endeavors.

articles.title: GoldenHome Dazzles at KBIS 2025 with Innovative Custom Cabinetry and Closet Solutions
articles.author: Golden Home
articles.summary: GoldenHome is showcasing new kitchen solutions. The new kitchen solutions come with extensive customization options.

articles.title: The HONOR X9c: Answering SA's call for tough and affordable smartphones
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X9c AI smartphone in South Africa, positioning it as a durable and value-for-money alternative to high-end flagship phones. The HONOR X9c features a curved AMOLED display, long-lasting battery, and drop-resistant technology, offered at a price of R10,999.

articles.title: Save your soles! These just-add-water shoe sponges banish grime for $1 each
articles.summary: SneakErasers, pre-moistened, dual-sided sponges, launched as a solution for cleaning sneaker soles. Originating from college entrepreneurs, the product appeared on Shark Tank and is now Amazon's No. 1 bestselling shoe cleaner, receiving positive reviews for its effectiveness in removing scuff marks and dirt from sneakers.

articles.title: The 9 Best Shampoos at Ulta, Tested and Reviewed by Editors
articles.author: Stacia Datskovska
articles.summary: Ulta offers a diverse range of shampoos, including L'Oréal's EverPure Glossing Shampoo, Kristin Ess's The One Signature Shampoo, and Ouai's Detox Shampoo. These shampoos cater to different hair needs, such as adding shine, cleansing without stripping natural oils, and removing buildup, respectively. Other new products mentioned include Divi's Volumizing Shampoo, Biolage's Hydra Source Shampoo, Briogeo's Scalp Revival Micro-Exfoliating Scrub Shampoo, and Bumble and bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Hydrating Shampoo.

articles.title: The Viral Headphones That Reviewers Say Are An Affordable Alternative To AirPods
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: The article highlights the Tozo NC9 noise-canceling, waterproof Bluetooth earbuds, currently on sale. It emphasizes features like sound quality, durability, battery life, and comfort, citing positive user reviews that compare them favorably to pricier options like Apple AirPods. The Tozo earbuds also feature a customizable sound via an app, compact charging case, and are lightweight.

articles.title: 20 Target Beauty Products That Work So Well, You'll Start To Seriously Question Their Low Price Tag
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: E.l.f. offers a leave-on lip mask with hyaluronic acid, castor seed oil, and squalene for hydration. Maybelline is highlighted for its pore-minimizing primer and a mascara praised on TikTok for lash enhancement. Kristin Ess presents a super moisturizing shampoo containing Zip-Up Technology to seal split ends.

articles.title: New Relic Unveils New Agentic AI Integration with ServiceNow to Help Enterprises Drive Business Uptime
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: New Relic has announced a new agentic AI integration with ServiceNow. This integration connects New Relic's Intelligent Observability Platform with ServiceNow to automate enterprise workflows, maximize business uptime, and minimize revenue loss. The integration provides deep insights and intelligent recommendations.

articles.title: Lidl's latest middle-aisle item is flying off the shelves for an unbeatable price
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has introduced a new dehumidifier available in stores for €119.99, featuring a 6.5L water tank and a moisture extraction rate of up to 20L/24 hours. Additionally, Lidl launched 'DOOP by Lidl,' a new beauty salon and skincare line inspired by luxury brands, with products starting at €1.99 and a pop-up salon in Dublin offering treatments from March 7-8.

articles.title: SteamDB Will Help You Filter Out Steam's AI Games
articles.author: Jorge A. Aguilar
articles.summary: SteamDB introduced a new filter that allows users to hide games made with generative AI on Steam. The filter uses an 'AI Content Disclosed' tag and highlights over 4,900 games that have disclosed their use of generative AI. Users can apply this filter to easily choose to see or ignore these games in their search results.

articles.title: How State Lawmakers Influence Trump's Domestic Agenda: Deportations to Healthcare
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The article introduces SEO plugins like Yoast SEO, All in One SEO Pack, and Rank Math for WordPress websites. These plugins provide tools to manage keywords and meta descriptions, enhancing website visibility and attracting organic traffic. Installation and activation of these plugins from the WordPress plugin directory is described.

articles.title: Exclusive: Aurora launches instant blockchain deployment via Cloud Console
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Aurora Labs unveiled a new feature in its Aurora Cloud Console, enabling instant functionality.

articles.title: Best Budget 5G Phones 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme confirmed the China launch of the Realme Neo 7 SE smartphone series.

articles.title: The insanely popular Ninja CREAMi is on sale at Target for a limited time
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Target is offering a limited-time deal of $100 off the Ninja 0.5qt CREAMi Stainless Steel Ice Cream, Gelato, and Sorbet Maker, priced at $200 (originally $230). This appliance can create ice cream, sorbet, milkshakes, and smoothie bowls using Creamify Technology and features seven one-touch programs, mix-in capabilities, and easy-to-clean components.

articles.title: FACT CHECK: X Image Does Not Show Authentic TIME Magazine Cover About DeepSeek ‘Sweatshop'
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese startup, recently announced that it will open-source five code repositories. The company previously released its open-source R1 reasoning model.

articles.title: Qualcomm unveils Dragonwing, the new name for its fight against Nvidia, Intel and AMD
articles.author: Mike Moore
articles.summary: Qualcomm is launching a new industrial and enterprise hardware product line called Dragonwing, separate from its Snapdragon consumer-facing hardware. Dragonwing aims to provide AI, computing, and connectivity solutions to industries such as energy, retail, manufacturing, and telecom. Qualcomm intends Dragonwing products to help businesses accelerate their digital transformation with speed and confidence.

articles.title: Noise Master Buds: How to get  ₹2,000 discount while pre-ordering
articles.author: Shaurya Sharma
articles.summary: Noise has introduced its new product, the Noise Master Buds, tuned by Bose, which are currently available for pre-booking on the Noise website. The earbuds feature Spatial Audio, adaptive ANC, and 12.4mm PEEK + Titanium drivers, with a claimed battery life of up to 44 hours with the charging case.

articles.title: LaCroix Does it Again . . . Game-Changing Event #2!
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: LaCroix Sparkling Water, a product of National Beverage Corp., introduced "Sunshine," a new methodology of innovation.

articles.title: Qualcomm unveils Dragonwing brand for IoT products
articles.summary: Qualcomm introduced Dragonwing, a new brand for its IoT products. This expansion targets industrial applications such as robots, drones, manufacturing, and retail equipment. Qualcomm plans to showcase the Dragonwing brand at upcoming MWC and Embedded World shows.

articles.title: PSG opens Labs in Doha; first step in global innovation expansion
articles.author: Santhosh V. Perumal
articles.summary: Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) launched PSG Labs in Doha, a global initiative to accelerate technology in sports, fan experience, and performance. PSG Labs aims to partner with startups and develop innovative solutions for the sports industry. This initiative marks PSG's expansion into global innovation, reinforcing its role as a leader in sports technology.

articles.title: How an online purchase led to a school washroom blast in Bilaspur
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Metla Sudha Sekhar offers new IT and AI courses, including Java Programming with ChatGPT, Generative AI basics, and AI for Dynamic Java Web Applications. Elearnmarkets launches A2Z Of Money, and Inara Marketers introduces Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands. Furthermore, Vskills is offering Certified Jenkins Professional program.

articles.title: NinjaTrader Arena Turns Futures Trading into a Challenge to Lure Younger Investors
articles.author: Finance Magnates
articles.summary: NinjaTrader launched NinjaTrader Arena, a simulated trading challenge series, in limited beta. The company also released a redesigned mobile application for iOS and Android devices.

articles.title: Amazon has some extremely cheap air fryer deals right now
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various air fryers, including a compact four-litre model with 10 programs, a 7.6-litre dual-drawer air fryer with "synccook" function, and a 10-litre air fryer with a divided chamber. Additionally, the Instant Pot Duo, which functions as a slow cooker, pressure cooker, rice cooker, and steamer, is also available at a reduced price.

articles.title: Prime Has Officially Ended This Quirky, Yet Popular New England Service
articles.author: Jolana Miller
articles.summary: Amazon Prime is phasing out its "Try It Before You Buy It" service, which allowed customers to try items for seven days before purchase. The decision is attributed to the limited scalability of the service and the increasing use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations by customers.

articles.title: Transform Your Future with L'Oréal's Brandstorm Innovation Competition
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: L'Oréal is promoting its Brandstorm Innovation Competition, a program for young South Africans to showcase innovative ideas in the beauty industry. The competition offers mentorship, an opportunity to present ideas to L'Oréal executives, and potential career opportunities within L'Oréal.

articles.title: Helium 10 Ushers in a Bold New Era of AI-Powered Advertising for Amazon and Walmart Sellers with Helium 10 Ads Powered by Pacvue
articles.summary: Helium 10 has launched Helium 10 Ads, a new solution combining its search optimization insights with Pacvue's advertising technology. This product aims to provide sellers with AI advertising capabilities for campaign management and performance optimization. Helium 10 Ads is designed to help sellers drive sustainable growth and is available to Platinum customers at no additional cost.

articles.title: Adobe brings free Photoshop app to phones, courting younger users
articles.author: Stephen Nellis
articles.summary: Adobe is launching a mobile version of its Photoshop app for iPhones, with an Android version coming soon. The app includes both a free version and a premium subscription at $7.99 per month with additional features, cloud storage, and web access. This launch targets younger users who primarily use phones for creating and editing content.

articles.title: Botify Unveils Agentic Workflows, Ushering Next Chapter for AI-Powered Search
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Botify unveiled a new mission focused on driving sustained growth in the expanded search landscape. This includes introducing agentic AI automation designed to address the evolving demands of AI-powered search. The company's agentic workflows aim to help brands remain visible online, both to consumers and AI agents.

articles.title: Reltio Unveils Industry-First Solution to Serve Trusted, Unified Data in Milliseconds at Every Point of Engagement, Driving Customer Experience Excellence
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Reltio launched Reltio Lightspeed™ Data Delivery Network. The network powers real-time applications and customer experiences with unified data. It delivers data in under 50 milliseconds globally.

articles.title: Helium 10 Ushers in a Bold New Era of AI-Powered Advertising for Amazon and Walmart Sellers ...
articles.author: Helium 10
articles.summary: Helium 10 has launched Helium 10 Ads, a new e-commerce solution combining search optimization insights and ad technology powered by Pacvue. This solution aims to provide sellers with AI-driven advertising capabilities for campaign management and performance optimization, offered at no additional cost to Platinum customers.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G Power 2025 Review: Nearly There
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Motorola introduced a new budget phone. The phone retains hallmarks of its predecessor but has performance regressions.

articles.title: NinjaTrader Launches Competition Series and Next-Generation Mobile App for Futures Traders
articles.author: Ninja Trader
articles.summary: NinjaTrader launched NinjaTrader Arena, a simulated futures trading challenge series allowing traders to compete. They also launched an enhanced NinjaTrader mobile app for Apple and Android devices, providing traders with improved on-the-go access.

articles.title: Qualcomm unveils Dragonwing brand for enterprise tech solutions
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Qualcomm has introduced a new brand, Qualcomm Dragonwing, to represent its products within the industrial, embedded IoT, enterprise, and networking sectors. This brand aims to empower businesses and industries by offering AI, computing, and connectivity solutions designed to drive transformation and growth.

articles.title: Ninja Disrupts the Outdoor Grilling Market with Launch of FlexFlame™
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SharkNinja, Inc. unveiled the Ninja™ FlexFlame™, a new outdoor cooking system. This propane system combines five cooking methods under one hood.

articles.title: WATERLOO SPARKLING WATER INTRODUCES TWO ALL-NEW FLAVORS, GUAVA BERRY AND RUBY RED TANGERINE, BURSTING WITH REFRESHING FULL FLAVOR
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Waterloo Sparkling Water has launched two new flavors, Guava Berry and Ruby Red Tangerine. These sparkling waters are available year-round and are made with Non-GMO Project Verified natural flavors, free of calories, sugar, and sweeteners. They are available at retailers nationwide, including Target, Kroger, and Whole Foods.

articles.title: VERSES® Announces Launch of Commercial Genius™ Agent Toolkit
articles.author: Verses Ai Inc.
articles.summary: VERSES AI Inc. is launching the commercial version of Genius in April. Genius is a suite of tools designed for creating autonomous intelligent agents that continuously reason, plan, and learn and is expected to be available to interested customers and partners. The models of Genius provide accuracy and reliability addressing critical market needs.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Corporation Graduates to the OTCQB® Venture Market and Confirms DTC Eligibility
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands' U.S. ticker symbol CZZLF will begin trading on the OTCQB® Venture Market. Cizzle Brands has launched two leading product lines in the sports nutrition category: CWENCH Hydration™, a better-for-you sports drink and Spoken Nutrition, a premium brand of athlete-grade nutraceuticals.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Corporation Graduates to the OTCQB® Venture Market and Confirms DTC Eligibility
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands has launched two product lines in the sports nutrition category: CWENCH Hydration™, a sports drink available in over 1,200 stores, and Spoken Nutrition, a premium brand of athlete-grade nutraceuticals. Both product lines are designed to help people achieve their best in both competitive sports and in living a healthy, vibrant, active lifestyle.

articles.title: BJ's Wholesale shopper demands return of alternative checkout feature – relatives are ‘blocked' from collecting orders
articles.author: James Evenden
articles.summary: BJ's shopper requested the return of a remote check-in option for the BJ's app's curbside pickup feature to allow someone else to pick up their order. BJ's responded to the feedback and offers two membership options: Club Card Membership and Club+ Card Membership.

articles.title: Alida Introduces New Usability Testing Tool to Leading UX Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Alida is launching a new product feature set on March 4, 2025, introducing unmoderated usability testing to its all-in-one platform. This enhancement enables brands to leverage their real users for usability testing research.

articles.title: Alida Introduces New Usability Testing Tool to Leading UX Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Alida is launching a new product feature set for unmoderated usability testing on March 4, 2025. This feature enables brands to leverage real user feedback on concepts, prototypes, and live websites, with the initial release including unmoderated screen recording to gather richer insights. Alida will showcase its usability testing tools at a product webinar on the same date.

articles.title: Alida Introduces New Usability Testing Tool to Leading UX Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Alida is launching new unmoderated usability testing capabilities within its platform on March 4, 2025. This new feature set will include unmoderated screen recording to enable brands to gather richer insights faster on concepts, prototypes, and live websites. A product showcase webinar is scheduled for March 4, 2025, to unveil Alida's new usability testing tools.

articles.title: VERSES® Announces Launch of Commercial Genius™ Agent Toolkit
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: VERSES AI Inc. plans to commercially launch Genius in April. Genius is a suite of tools designed for creating autonomous intelligent agents that reason, plan, and learn continuously, targeting applications like autonomous vehicle safety and fraud detection. The product has been refined through a private beta phase.

articles.title: SodaStream Introduces Online Cylinder Exchange Program to Enhance Convenience and Sustainability
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SodaStream launched a Cylinder Exchange program, designed for customer convenience and sustainability. This service provides automatic reordering and streamlined gas refills at home.

articles.title: SodaStream Introduces Online Cylinder Exchange Program to Enhance Convenience and Sustainability
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SodaStream has launched its Online Cylinder Exchange program in Canada. The service allows customers to conveniently reorder and exchange CO2 cylinders for their sparkling water makers, offering options for cylinder type, quantity, and delivery frequency. The program is designed to make enjoying sparkling water effortless and sustainable, also simplifying the return and exchange process of CO2 cylinders.

articles.title: The Shark and Dyson vacuum rival that Brits say they are 'in love with'
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Ultenic is offering a cordless vacuum cleaner that has garnered positive reviews from customers, who praise its power, lightweight design, and effectiveness on various floor types, particularly for pet hair removal. Some customers have noted the suction power may not be sufficient for carpets, but customer service is helpful in addressing concerns and swapping for other models.

articles.title: KickBallz® to Leverage Nogin's Enterprise-Class Ecommerce Technology and End-to-End Services to Launch New D2C Sales Channel
articles.summary: KickBallz, a caffeinated gum brand, partnered with Nogin to launch its direct-to-consumer (D2C) e-commerce business. Nogin's Intelligent Commerce technology and services are streamlining KickBallz's online operations, including storefront management, inventory planning, and marketing, while also expanding its reach on platforms like Amazon.

articles.title: Alida Introduces New Usability Testing Tool to Leading UX Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Alida is launching a new product feature set that brings unmoderated usability testing into its all-in-one platform on March 4, 2025. This enhancement allows brands to use real users for usability testing research. The new feature set from Alida includes collaboration capabilities at its product showcase on March 4, 2025.

articles.title: Taco Bell relaunches its Cantina Chicken menu with a new hot sauce
articles.author: Fielding Buck
articles.summary: A fast food giant introduced a new spicy sauce made with red jalapeños. This sauce aims to enhance the flavor of tacos, burritos, and bowls.

articles.title: Alida Introduces New Usability Testing Tool to Leading UX Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Alida will launch a new product feature set on March 4, 2025, bringing unmoderated usability testing into its platform. These enhancements will enable brands to leverage users for usability testing research.

articles.title: Asus Announces Fragrance Mouse That Probably Smells Better Than Your Sweat-Soaked One
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Asus announced a new mouse featuring soft pastel colors and a built-in oil diffuser.

articles.title: Driven Brands Announces Agreement to Divest U.S. Car Wash Business for $385 Million
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Driven Brands has agreed to sell its U.S. car wash business to Express Wash Operations, LLC dba Whistle Express Car Wash for $385 million. The transaction is expected to close in the second quarter of 2025, subject to customary closing conditions.

articles.title: AI Won't Replace Creativity, But Will Amplify It: Aarti Samant
articles.author: Reshmi AR
articles.summary: Meta has introduced AI-powered ad features, including Advantage+ Sales and Leads Campaigns and the Opportunity Score. Early testing of Advantage+ lead campaigns showed a 10% lower cost per qualified lead. The Opportunity Score provides real-time recommendations to improve campaign performance and advertisers have seen a 5% drop in cost per result by following them.

articles.title: M&S shoppers 'sleep better now' with £18 'beautifully made' pillows
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is offering their Supremely Washable Firm Pillows, praised for their high quality, breathable cotton-blend cover, hypoallergenic fillings, and suitability for side sleepers.  The pillows are machine washable and available in two-packs, with a king-size option. Competing firm pillows are also available from retailers like Next, Amazing and Dunelm.

articles.title: Amazon cast iron pot 'better than Le Creuset' is under £40 in sale
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Nuovva Cast Iron Pot with Lid to £36.99. The pot, available in various colors and sizes, is compared to Le Creuset. Lakeland also offers the Lakeland Cast Aluminium Non-Stick Casserole for £39.99.

articles.title: The Ordinary's new £10 essence instantly revived my lacklustre skin
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: The Ordinary has launched a new "multi-active delivery essence" priced at £10.60. This essence aims to hydrate, condition, and prepare the skin for subsequent skincare products by increasing ingredient penetration. The product was tested for a month to assess its effectiveness.

articles.title: Red Bull Summer Edition unveiled as White Peach
articles.author: Jake Kennedy
articles.summary: Red Bull is launching its White Peach Summer Edition energy drink on March 2nd. The new flavor will be available in various formats including 250ml plain and PMP cans, 4x250ml multipacks, and a 355ml sugar-free version. White Peach replaces the Curuba Elderflower edition and aims to drive further growth in the energy drink category.

articles.title: ‘So what have I been using that for?': Woman says she was sold a GE washer and dryer ‘set' 6 years ago. Then she makes discovery
articles.author: Beau Paul
articles.summary: General Electric (GE) offers a washer-dryer combo with a 'one-step wash and dry' feature.  This feature is designed for small loads and can function as both a washer and dryer in a single machine. The efficiency and effectiveness of the drying function, particularly compared to traditional dryers, are discussed.

articles.title: When you place an order through the app, the robot loaded with the product will load the product at ..
articles.author: Lee Hyo-Seok
articles.summary: Woowa Brothers' Baemin has launched its unmanned autonomous robot delivery service, "Dili", in parts of Nonhyeon-dong and Yeoksam-dong in Gangnam-gu, Seoul, offering deliveries from B Mart within 30 minutes for orders meeting a minimum of 15,000 won. The service operates from 2 p.m. to 9 p.m. on weekdays, with plans to expand its reach after May. Yogiyo also has a similar robot delivery service in operation.

articles.title: Bacardi Announces a New Era for MARTINI®
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bacardi is introducing the MARTINI Bianco Spritz, a new signature drink, along with a redesigned, lighter bottle for MARTINI vermouth.  They are also launching the 'MARTINI Dare To Be' marketing campaign to promote the aperitivo occasion and reach a new generation of drinkers.

articles.title: ஹார்னெட் 2.0-வில் ஹோண்டா கொடுத்திருக்கும் புதிய வசதிகள் என்னென்ன?
articles.summary: Honda Hornet features new advancements. These features represent updates or introduction of enhanced functionalities for the Honda Hornet.

articles.title: Home Bargains' 'beyond comfy' £14 pyjamas shoppers swear they 'need'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched a new cherry print pyjama set, retailing for £14 as part of their Original collection, and a new lip treatment, Charlie Tate London's Peptide Lip Treatment 14ml, for £1.49. The lip treatment is available in Toasted Vanilla, Matcha Cream, Blueberry Lavender, and Sugared Rose varieties, designed to provide soothing and hydrated lips.

articles.title: Talking points at the Green Parrot
articles.author: Frank Chemaly
articles.summary: The Green Parrot restaurant features a frequently updated menu with new and interesting Asian fusion dishes. Recent additions include items such as crispy chilli fish, tuna salad poke bowl style, prawn stirfry in peanut sauce, chu chee duck, golden noodle duck with honey-soy glaze, and crispy pork belly with a spicy umami dipping sauce.

articles.title: You Can Get a Great $300 Phone as Long as You Make One Choice
articles.author: Mike Sorrentino
articles.summary: Samsung is extending the lifespan of its cheaper Galaxy A series phones, with the Galaxy A15 and A25 receiving four years of software updates and five years of security updates, and the Galaxy A16 receiving six years of each. Motorola's 2025 Moto G phones are getting two years of software updates and three years of security updates. The Google Pixel 6A will now get software updates until July 2027 along with security updates for the same amount of time.

articles.title: Pudu Robotics Enhances Cleaning Efficiency at Ryugujo Spa Hotel Mikazuki Ryugutei with the Introduction of PUDU SH1
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pudu Robotics introduced its new PUDU SH1 smart upright scrubber dryer at Ryugujo Spa Hotel Mikazuki Ryugutei, enhancing cleaning efficiency and standards. The SH1 has improved cleaning quality, reduced physical strain on staff, and saved labor hours, allowing the hotel to focus on improving customer service and personalized experiences.

articles.title: Multiple Reviewers Referred To This Stain Remover As 'Witchcraft'
articles.author: Laura White
articles.summary: Miss Mouth's Messy Eater stain treater spray is garnering attention for its effectiveness in removing various stains, from baby food spills to old smoke stains. Customers praise its fast-acting formula and versatility, highlighting its success on clothes, car upholstery, and even sneakers. It is designed to work lightning fast without the use of harmful chemicals like sulfates or formaldehydes.

articles.title: 'Fantastic' Amazon coffee machine that 'gives the best taste' reduced to £43
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: A new filter coffee machine has been introduced, featuring advanced showerhead technology, a permanent filter, and the ability to brew up to ten cups of coffee at once. It includes useful features like a water level indicator, pause and pour, auto clean, and a keep-warm function. The machine is designed to provide convenience and a better coffee experience.

articles.title: Fusion Bank and WeBank Technology Services Forge New Benchmark in FinTech Collaboration with Next-Gen Core System
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Fusion Bank launched a new-generation core banking system in October of last year, developed in collaboration with WeBank Technology Services and Tencent Cloud. This new system has halved the time required for new product development and is projected to reduce non-human IT costs by 53% over the next three years. The system integrates key features of digital banking solutions and can scale on demand according to business growth.

articles.title: Exposé Marketing Solutions: A new Digital experience that tells our story
articles.summary: Exposé Marketing Solutions launched an upgraded website intended as a digital hub to showcase its creativity and brand storytelling capabilities.  The website is designed with improved navigation, case studies, interactive features, and behind-the-scenes content. The company has been helping companies such as Chivas, Axe, and Martell in creating memorable customer experiences.

O-Cedar launched a mop and bucket set with a hands-free wringing system. Tulip introduced a renter-friendly shade for ugly ceiling lights, with magnetic installation.

articles.title: Unilever faces battle to reduce plant-based meat exposure
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Unilever is considering selling its plant-based meat business, The Vegetarian Butcher, due to declining consumer interest in processed alternatives. Similarly, Nestle has reduced its plant-based Sweet Earth offerings after reassessing the market size. Both companies are adjusting their product focus in response to market trends in the plant-based meat sector.

articles.title: Boden's 'flattering' and 'most beautiful' dress now £44
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Boden's Ivy Smocked Midi Dress is now available at a reduced price of £44. The dress comes in various prints and sizes, crafted from Viscose and elastane, and described as floaty with a smocked waist. Customer reviews highlight its flattering fit and versatility.

articles.title: Boden's 'flattering' and 'most beautiful' dress now £44 in sale
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Boden significantly reduced the price of its Ivy Smocked Midi Dress to £44 from £110 as part of their ongoing sale. The dress, available in various prints and sizes, is crafted from Viscose and elastane, and known for its flattering fit and versatility.

articles.title: Boden reduces 'gorgeous' £110 dress that 'fits like a glove' to £44
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Boden is offering the 'Ivy Smocked Midi Dress', praised for its fit and versatility, made of Viscose and elastane. The dress is available in various patterns and lengths; however, some customers have critiqued the fabric quality, noting issues such as color loss and transparency.

articles.title: Boden reduces £110 dress to £44 that's 'super flattering' and 'fits like a glove'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Boden is offering the Ivy Smocked Midi Dress as part of their latest sale, reduced from £110 to £44. The dress is available in multiple patterns and lengths, crafted from a blend of Viscose (LENZING™ECOVERO™) and elastane, featuring a smocked waist and notch neckline.

articles.title: Nuu Mobile N20 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Nuu Mobile officially announced the N20 smartphone in the first quarter of 2025. The budget smartphone features a 6.6-inch display, Unisoc Tiger T606 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, a dual-camera setup (16MP + 8MP), and a 5000 mAh battery, and is available in multiple colors.

articles.title: SpyneAI Inc. Raises $16M Series A to Grow Across the U.S. and Transform Automotive Retail with GenAI
articles.author: Spyne
articles.summary: Spyne will introduce a GenAI-powered unified automotive retail solution. This solution aims to revolutionize the entire retail process for dealerships. The goal is to grow Spyne's U.S. dealer client base significantly.

articles.title: SpyneAI Inc. Raises $16M Series A to Grow Across the U.S. and Transform Automotive Retail with GenAI
articles.summary: SpyneAI is launching a unified AI-powered automotive retail solution to help dealerships source, price, and sell vehicles more efficiently using GenAI and Agentic AI. This solution aims to make the entire retail experience for used-car dealerships more seamless, cost-effective, and data-driven. SpyneAI plans to reach 20,000+ rooftops across the US, making the dealer transaction journey more efficient using its GenAI-powered automotive retail solution.

articles.title: Forget Luxury, Choose Durability: Why the HONOR X9c Stands Out in South Africa
articles.author: Pauline Torongo
articles.summary: HONOR has introduced the HONOR X9c AI smartphone in South Africa, priced at R10,999. The device boasts features like a curved AMOLED display, long-lasting battery, and drop-resistant technology. It is positioned as a durable and practical alternative to pricier flagship smartphones, catering to the needs of South African consumers.

articles.title: Samsung's tri-fold phone may launch in July alongside Galaxy Z Fold 7- What we know so far
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly preparing to launch the Galaxy G Fold, a tri-fold smartphone, potentially in July alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. The Galaxy G Fold may feature a 6.49-inch cover display and a 9.96-inch main foldable display, with a folding mechanism different from the Huawei Mate XT. Mass production for the Galaxy G Fold may begin in April.

articles.title: Centric Software Announces the Acquisition of AI-Powered PXM Solution, Contentserv
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Centric Software has acquired Contentserv, a PIM and PXM solution provider, for EUR 220 million. The acquisition allows Centric to integrate Contentserv's AI-powered Product Experience Cloud (PXC) into its solutions. This integration aims to transform product content into market-ready experiences, improve time-to-market, and increase consumer engagement and conversion.

articles.title: The Mills Fabrica Launches New Service to Support Brands and Organisations Advance Their Sustainability Journey
articles.summary: The Mills Fabrica has launched a new partnership service aimed at helping businesses of all sizes advance their environmental and social impact. This service offers bespoke programs like Sustainability Discovery Day, Sustainability Workshops, and Impact Retail & Pop-Up Experiences. The service has already engaged nearly 50 global businesses since its soft launch eight months ago.

articles.title: Dassault Systèmes Announces Centric Software's Acquisition of AI-Powered PXM Solution, Contentserv
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Centric Software is acquiring Contentserv, a PIM and PXM solution provider, for €220 million. Contentserv's Product Experience Cloud (PXC) transforms product data into revenue, and this acquisition is expected to allow Centric Software to offer enriched product experiences.

articles.title: Amazon deal sees bargain Ariel washing pods fall to 20p each
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Amazon offers a deal on Ariel All-in-1 PODS for £23.87, reducing the price to 20p per pod. These laundry detergent tablets are designed for cold washes and remove stains in one wash, potentially saving up to 60% on electricity bills and reducing CO2 emissions.

articles.summary: Samsung launched its flagship product featuring a 6.9-inch QHD+ display, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 200MP camera.

articles.title: 7 Most Unusual Ice Cream Flavours You Won't Believe Exist
articles.summary: The article introduces several new ice cream flavors. These include Roasted Sweet Potato (smooth, nutty, and sweet), Chili (creamy and cool with a fiery kick), Chai (cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, and cloves), Wasabi (mild wasabi kick), Cheesecake (creamy and salty), Soy Sauce (caramel-like depth with umami), and Black Garlic (rich, fruity flavor). These flavors represent new product offerings, indicating an introduction of new products.

articles.title: Yottaa Launches Web Performance Services
articles.summary: Yottaa launched Yottaa Web Performance Services, a managed solution to maximize website speed and security for online retailers. The service leverages Fastly's Edge Cloud, HUMAN's Defense Platform, and Yottaa Web Performance Cloud. Yottaa's experts handle monitoring, issue resolution, and security, proactively blocking DDoS attacks and bot fraud.

articles.title: The Rise of AI Agents: How Autonomous AI will Reshape Business Processes
articles.author: Olufemi Kazeem Oluoje
articles.summary: AI agents are poised to revolutionize Nigerian businesses by offering smarter customer service, 24/7 operations, faster decision-making, personalized marketing, and efficient manufacturing. One example includes AI Frontdesk, an AI agent that can handle phone calls, schedule appointments, and answer questions after hours, storing all requests in a CRM system.

articles.title: DailyObjects partners with Zepto, unveils new ad film
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: DailyObjects has launched its product range, including power banks and chargers, on Zepto, a quick commerce company. This partnership allows consumers to access DailyObjects' products within ten minutes through Zepto's rapid delivery model. The collaboration is highlighted by a campaign film showing the convenience of this new accessibility.

articles.title: Asus' new mouse isn't just clickable - it's sniffable
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Asus has revealed its new Fragrance Mouse.

articles.title: Putin Invites European Involvement in Ukraine Conflict Resolution, RFI Reports
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: WP Rocket, W3 Total Cache, and WP Super Cache are popular WordPress caching plugins. WP Rocket is a premium plugin known for its ease of use and powerful features, while W3 Total Cache is a free plugin with advanced configuration options. WP Super Cache is another free plugin that offers a balance of performance and ease of use.

articles.title: 8 Incredible Gucci Colognes for Men
articles.author: Garrett Munce
articles.summary: Gucci offers a wide range of fragrances, including Gucci Guilty and The Alchemist's Garden, characterized by duality and unique blends. These scents cater to various preferences, from sweet and fresh to woody and mysterious, providing options for different occasions, indicating a varied product line appealing to a broad customer base.

articles.title: Mitsubishi puts a lid on Triton with new accessory options
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Mitsubishi is introducing a variety of new accessories for its new-generation Triton pickup truck. These new options enhance the vehicle's utility and load-carrying capabilities.

articles.title: Asus reveals scented wireless mouse for a multi-sensory computing experience
articles.author: Alfonso Maruccia
articles.summary: Asus is launching the Fragrance Mouse, a wireless mouse featuring a customizable scent. Available in white and pink, it offers three adjustable DPI levels (1200, 1600, and 2400) and an ergonomic design.

articles.title: Test-Driving The 2025 Porsche Taycan Turbo
articles.author: Alistair Charlton
articles.summary: Porsche has launched the 2025 Taycan Turbo, starting at $173,600, and the Taycan Turbo GT starting at $230,000. The new Taycan features performance upgrades including increased power, a larger 97 kWh battery, faster charging up to 320 kW, and an optional Active Ride system. The Taycan Turbo offers 871 hp and has an EPA range of 292 miles.

articles.title: A Leader's Guide To Building A Customer-Obsessed Culture
articles.author: Brent Gleeson
articles.summary: Two Rivers Coffee, under CEO Stephen Schreiber, focuses on innovative flavors and high quality to create an exceptional coffee experience. They partnered with Eggo to translate the comforting feeling of childhood mornings into a coffee experience people can enjoy daily. This partnership aims to humanize the brand and connect with customers on an emotional level.

articles.title: The Hidden Value Of Service Guarantees
articles.author: Jon Picoult
articles.summary: The article discusses how companies implement service guarantees. L.L. Bean has modified their satisfaction guarantee, now giving people one full year to return a product. AT&T recently introduced an industry-first connectivity guarantee, offering bill credits for service outages.

articles.title: How AI Agents Help Businesses Better Serve Customers
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Wendy's is developing FreshAI™, an AI agent, to improve drive-thru customer service by processing natural speech and customizing orders. Jotform is also preparing to launch AI agents to better serve its users and enhance customer engagement. These AI agents aim to personalize interactions, anticipate customer needs, and build stronger brand relationships across industries.

articles.summary: Qualcomm introduced Qualcomm Dragonwing, a new brand for its industrial, embedded IoT, enterprise, and networking products.

articles.title: Drizzle, Sizzle, And Now Frizzle. Graza Debuts New High-Heat Cooking Oil And Spray Bottle Format
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Graza launched a high-heat cooking oil and introduced several new packaging formats.

articles.title: 3 Beloved 90s Mall Restaurants That Have Disappeared In NJ
articles.author: Jahna Michal
articles.summary: Dairy Queen owns the Orange Julius brand.  The company still offers the original Orange Julius flavors at participating DQ locations. This information represents an update on the availability of the Orange Julius product line.
